We rented paddleboards and had a great time paddling around and challenging each other to races. The best part was when we all jumped into the lake for a refreshing swim. We ended the day with a picnic by the shore, sharing stories and enjoying the beautiful scenery. It was a perfect day filled with laughter, adventure, and great company.
